channel.title: Runepact | A Fresh Start
channel.description:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/6QiUu.png[/img] [hr] [b]Runepact is a project that will hopefully become a great server. As in many other projects, many goals are highly dreamed of; this will lead us to our dedication of putting nothing but hard work into the server. We hope that this development thread will not only help keep our dedication strong due to the support, but also inspire others that dreams are achievable.[/b] [hr]
[b]Development Team:[/b]
[ul][li]Jaxus[/li] [li]TheProdigy[/li] [li]The Web Guy[/li][/ul]
[hr]
[b]Color Legend:[/b]
[ul][li]Not working[/li] [li]In progress[/li] [li]Finished[/li][/ul]
[hr]
[img]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122084602/runescape/images/5/51/Attack-icon.png[/img] [b]Strength | Attack | Hitpoints | Defence[/b] [ul][li]Combat Formulas[/li] [li]Correct blocking/defensive bonuses[/li] [li]Player vs Player[/li] [li]Player vs NPC[/li][/ul]
[hr]
[img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122082216/runescape/images/7/72/Ranged-icon.png[/img] [b]Ranged[/b]
[ul][li]Projectile clipping[/li] [li]Correct bolt bonuses[/li] [li]Timers[/li][/ul]
[hr]
[img]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122182528/runescape/images/7/77/Magic-icon.png[/img] [b]Magic[/b]
[ul][li]Correct spell rune requirements[/li] [li]Magic switching (Lunars/Ancients)[/li] [li]Timers[/li][/ul]
[hr]
[img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120121220331/runescape/images/2/24/Prayer-icon.png[/img][b] Prayer[/b]
[ul][li]All bones can be buried[/li] [li]Bones -> Altar[/li] [li]Ectofuntus[/li][/ul]
[hr]
[img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122213351/runescape/images/f/f0/Farming-icon.png[/img] [b]Farming[/b]
[ul][li]Universal patch support[/li] [li]All seeds[/li] [li]Five minute interval of patch growing[/li] [li]Multiple player support[/li][/ul]
[hr]
[img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122191028/runescape/images/2/28/Mining-icon.png[/img] [b]Mining[/b]
[ul][li]Universal ore support[/li] [li]All ores can be mined[/li] [li]Random gem mining[/li] [li]Rock golem spawning[/li] [li]Inventory checking for pickaxe[/li] [li]Best pickaxe check when multiple are in inventory[/li][/ul]
[hr]
[img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122232122/runescape/images/d/df/Smithing-icon.png[/img] [b]Smithing[/b]
[ul][li]Timers[/li] [li]Correct smelting/smithing interfaces[/li] [li]Select (5, 10, X, All)[/li] [li]Double experience whilst smelting gold ore and wearing gold gauntlets[/li][/ul]
[hr]
[img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120123002212/runescape/images/0/0b/Fishing-icon.png[/img] [b]Fishing[/b]
[ul][li]All fishing locations[/li] [li]Timer based on player level[/li] [li]Inventory space check[/li] [li]Equipment/level checks[/li] [li]Special fish that requires level 99 to fish[/li][/ul]
[hr] [img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122222711/runescape/images/0/0f/Woodcutting-icon.png[/img] [b]Woodcutting[/b]
[ul][li]Normal logs - Magic logs[/li] [li]Bird nests[/li] [li]Timers[/li][/ul]
[hr]
[img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122200319/runescape/images/7/77/Fletching-icon.png[/img] [b]Fletching[/b]
[ul][li]Normal bow - Magic bow fletching[/li] [li]Picking Flax[/li] [li]Spinning Flax[/li][/ul]
[hr]
[img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122231156/runescape/images/4/48/Crafting-icon.png[/img] [b]Crafting[/b]
[ul][li]All bodies, vambraces and chap creation[/li] [li]All gem crafting[/li] [li]Chance to smash gems on failure[/li][/ul]
[hr]
[img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122223429/runescape/images/6/64/Runecrafting-icon.png[/img] [b]Runecrafting[/b]
[ul][li]All runes can be crafted at appending altars[/li] [li]Talisman teleporting to certain altar[/li] [li]Pouches[/li][/ul]
[hr]
[img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122221425/runescape/images/8/84/Agility-icon.png[/img] [b]Agility[/b]
[ul][li]All courses (Gnome, Barbarian, Wilderness)[/li] [li]Tickets awarded for completion of each lap[/li] [li]Shop featuring rewards that can be purchased with those tickets[/li][/ul]
[hr] [b] [u][size=6]MEDIA[/size]:[/u] [img]http://i.imgur.com/ZxWTA.png[/img]
[hr]
[/b] I'm aware that there are still a ton of things to do. This is basically just a layout for future updates; however, just because they are marked red doesn't mean they aren't currently in the server code, which most probably are. I'll try to provide some media later tonight whenever I get off of work. If you are interested in joining the team, please visit the link below to apply: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,559168.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,559168.0.html[/url]

item.title: Runepact | A Fresh Start
item.dc:creator: @Jaxus Jaxus
item.description:
@Jaxus wrote:

I’m currently working on switching over content to our new base; there is no need for describing the origin of the base, but I can say that it has been optimized to perform better, in comparison to the old server, that is.

We are still looking for a client developer! I’ve started learning client protocol, but it would still be great to have someone on the team with more client experience than me.

Read full topic

item.title: Runepact | A Fresh Start
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Ask a global mod or admin.

Read full topic

item.title: Runepact | A Fresh Start
item.dc:creator: @Jaxus Jaxus
item.description:
@Jaxus wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:11, topic:456601”][quote author=Jaxus link=topic=559540.msg4095744#msg4095744 date=1346811601]

Bummmmmmppitydooo

No. I get the odd feeling this is another account you created, which is against the rules, especially when you use it to bump your own thread.

OT: Good luck I guess… I’ve seen this layout on another development thread before though.

That really offends me. I wouldn’t create a new account just to bump my thread.
[/quote]
That wasn’t pointed directly at you, but at the project members in general.[/quote]
Alright.

Also, is there anyway I can get links to my forum verified? I’m in dire need of a few BETA testers.

Read full topic

item.title: Runepact | A Fresh Start
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[quote=“Jaxus, post:10, topic:456601”][quote author=tyb97 link=topic=559540.msg4095657#msg4095657 date=1346804447]

OT: Good luck I guess… I’ve seen this layout on another development thread before though.
[/quote]
That really offends me. I wouldn’t create a new account just to bump my thread.[/quote]
That wasn’t pointed directly at you, but at the project members in general.

item.title: Runepact | A Fresh Start
item.dc:creator: @Jaxus Jaxus
item.description:
@Jaxus wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:9, topic:456601”][quote author=ShotY0u link=topic=559540.msg4095622#msg4095622 date=1346801535]
Bummmmmmppitydooo
[/quote]
No. I get the odd feeling this is another account you created, which is against the rules, especially when you use it to bump your own thread.

OT: Good luck I guess… I’ve seen this layout on another development thread before though.[/quote]
That really offends me. I wouldn’t create a new account just to bump my thread. Also, this format probably has been seen before, because I was a developer of Oberon, which had a similar post format.

I know I haven’t updated the thread in a few days; however, I have actually been working on the server. Fishing is now completely finished and I’m currently working on cleaning out some code that is not needed at the moment.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97

item.title: Runepact | A Fresh Start
item.dc:creator: @Jaxus Jaxus
item.description:
@Jaxus wrote:

xxxtilllyxxx:

Might I ask which base it is?

We are currently using a PI; however, we have been discussing this lately and we might switch to Hyperion. The content we have added has been recorded and will only require a simple conversion, although it may take some time. There are some things done in Hyperion that we do not like though.

Read full topic

item.title: Runepact | A Fresh Start
item.dc:creator: @xxxtilllyxxx xxxtilllyxxx
item.description:
@xxxtilllyxxx wrote:

Might I ask which base it is?

Read full topic

item.title: Runepact | A Fresh Start
item.dc:creator: @Jaxus Jaxus
item.description:
@Jaxus wrote:

xxxtilllyxxx:

Is this a pre-written base? Or a framework. If it’s a framework I would apply.

The base has been pre-written, but we do hope to modify it to our liking.

Read full topic

item.title: Runepact | A Fresh Start
item.dc:creator: @xxxtilllyxxx xxxtilllyxxx
item.description:
@xxxtilllyxxx wrote:

Is this a pre-written base? Or a framework. If it’s a framework I would apply.

Read full topic

item.title: Runepact | A Fresh Start
item.dc:creator: @Jaxus Jaxus
item.description:
@Jaxus wrote:

Iscn:

Good Luck!

Thanks.

Started working on Farming again:

[ul][li]All patches are supported and grow over a 5 minute interval.[/li]
[li]There is a problem when multiple players try to plant a herb on the same patch; basically, the herb growing process goes through one cycle and stops growing completely.[/li][/ul]

Read full topic

item.title: Runepact | A Fresh Start
item.dc:creator: @Iscn Iscn
item.description:
@Iscn wrote:

Good Luck!

Read full topic

item.title: Runepact | A Fresh Start
item.dc:creator: @Jaxus Jaxus
item.description:
@Jaxus wrote:

6QiUu.png950×175

[hr]
Runepact is a project that will hopefully become a great server. As in many other projects, many goals are highly dreamed of; this will lead us to our dedication of putting nothing but hard work into the server. We hope that this development thread will not only help keep our dedication strong due to the support, but also inspire others that dreams are achievable.
[hr]

Development Team:

[ul][li]Jaxus[/li]
[li]TheProdigy[/li]
[li]The Web Guy[/li][/ul]

[hr]

Color Legend:

[ul][li]Not working[/li]
[li]In progress[/li]
[li]Finished[/li][/ul]

[hr]

Strength | Attack | Hitpoints | Defence
[ul][li]Combat Formulas[/li]
[li]Correct blocking/defensive bonuses[/li]
[li]Player vs Player[/li]
[li]Player vs NPC[/li][/ul]

[hr]

Ranged

[ul][li]Projectile clipping[/li]
[li]Correct bolt bonuses[/li]
[li]Timers[/li][/ul]

[hr]

Magic

[ul][li]Correct spell rune requirements[/li]
[li]Magic switching (Lunars/Ancients)[/li]
[li]Timers[/li][/ul]

[hr]

Prayer

[ul][li]All bones can be buried[/li]
[li]Bones -> Altar[/li]
[li]Ectofuntus[/li][/ul]

[hr]

Farming

[ul][li]Universal patch support[/li]
[li]All seeds[/li]
[li]Five minute interval of patch growing[/li]
[li]Multiple player support[/li][/ul]

[hr]

Mining

[ul][li]Universal ore support[/li]
[li]All ores can be mined[/li]
[li]Random gem mining[/li]
[li]Rock golem spawning[/li]
[li]Inventory checking for pickaxe[/li]
[li]Best pickaxe check when multiple are in inventory[/li][/ul]

[hr]

Smithing

[ul][li]Timers[/li]
[li]Correct smelting/smithing interfaces[/li]
[li]Select (5, 10, X, All)[/li]
[li]Double experience whilst smelting gold ore and wearing gold gauntlets[/li][/ul]

[hr]

Fishing

[ul][li]All fishing locations[/li]
[li]Timer based on player level[/li]
[li]Inventory space check[/li]
[li]Equipment/level checks[/li]
[li]Special fish that requires level 99 to fish[/li][/ul]

[hr]
Woodcutting

[ul][li]Normal logs - Magic logs[/li]
[li]Bird nests[/li]
[li]Timers[/li][/ul]

[hr]

Fletching

[ul][li]Normal bow - Magic bow fletching[/li]
[li]Picking Flax[/li]
[li]Spinning Flax[/li][/ul]

[hr]

Crafting

[ul][li]All bodies, vambraces and chap creation[/li]
[li]All gem crafting[/li]
[li]Chance to smash gems on failure[/li][/ul]

[hr]

Runecrafting

[ul][li]All runes can be crafted at appending altars[/li]
[li]Talisman teleporting to certain altar[/li]
[li]Pouches[/li][/ul]

[hr]

Agility

[ul][li]All courses (Gnome, Barbarian, Wilderness)[/li]
[li]Tickets awarded for completion of each lap[/li]
[li]Shop featuring rewards that can be purchased with those tickets[/li][/ul]

[hr]
[b]
[size=6]MEDIA[/size]:

ZxWTA.png764×503

[hr]

[/b]
I’m aware that there are still a ton of things to do. This is basically just a layout for future updates; however, just because they are marked red doesn’t mean they aren’t currently in the server code, which most probably are. I’ll try to provide some media later tonight whenever I get off of work. If you are interested in joining the team, please visit the link below to apply:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,559168.0.html
